Text: Is that Halo 2 or which one ?
It is Halo CE, with a mod, wich included new single player maps...
The Installer is not in English. I really hope the game is because I've had to download this twice
Works AMAZINGLY once you figure out what the ?russian? buttons in the installer mean. Awesome game, and perfect choice of maps in Campaign

seriously guys this modification is for all halo lovers who played halo for many times try this one also,all new maps guns aliens (guns and aliens forces are the combination of both halo 1 and halo) but still try it u r gonna love it its freking awesome !!!!!!
nice work guys
